text: Mother of Mine () is a 2019 South Korean television series starring Kim Hae- sook, Kim So-yeon, Kim Ha-kyung, Park Geun-soo, Nam Tae-boo and Choi Myung- gil. The series aired on KBS2 every Saturday and Sunday from 19:55 to 21:15 (KST) from March 23 to September 22, 2019. ==Synopsis== The story of two women's relationships with their daughters. ==Cast== ===Main=== * Kim Hae-sook as Park Seon-ja * Choi Myung-gil as Jeon In-sook * Kim So-yeon as Kang Mi-ri * Yoo Sun as Kang Mi-seon * Kim Ha-kyung as Kang Mi-hye * Park Geun-soo as Park Yeong-dal * Nam Tae-boo as Bang Jae-beom * Hong Jong-hyun as Han Tae-joo ===Supporting=== ====Han Cheon Ox Bone Soup Restaurant==== * Jo Seung-wook as Min-woo (part-timer) ====HS Group==== * Dong Bang-woo as Han Jong-soo * Kang Sung-yeon as Na Hye-mi * Choi Jae-won as Na Do-jin * Lee Ro-woon as Han Tae-ho ====Kang Mi-seon's family==== * Joo Hyun as Jeong Dae-cheol * Park Jung-soo as Ha Mi-ok * Lee Won-jae as Jeong Jin-soo * Joo Ye-rim as Jeong Da-bin ====Doldamgil Publishings==== * Ki Tae-young as Kim Woo-jin * Han Ki-woong as Peter Park ====HS Group Marketing and Strategy Department==== * Kim Wang-geun as Kim Seung-cheol * Jo Young-hoon as Park Tae-ho * Lee Tae-yeon as Lee Min- joo * Jo Joo-won as Park Ji-soo * Kim Yeo-jin as Jo Min-hye ====The Bank==== * Kim Se-dong as Park Haeng-woon * Joo In-young as Seo Kyung-jin * Yang Eo-jin as Park Min-ji * Yoon Bo-mi as Han Na-young ===Special appearances=== * Joo Hyun-mi as Wang Wei * Lee Sang-woo as Mi-ri's blinddate * Go Kyu-pil as police officer * Lee Hwang-ui as Woo-jin's father * Lee Mi-young as pharmacist * Kim Gi-ha as Yeong-dal's friend * Lee Da-hae as Seo Hee-jin ==Ratings== * In this table, represent the lowest ratings and represent the highest ratings. * N/A denotes that the rating is not known. {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !
